name: LOBBY
locationInformation: ChaiOne is an Enterprise Mobility Agency focused on creating innovative, beautiful mobile solutions that solve complex business problems of large enterprises, with a specific focus on the energy industry.

name: IDEAWALL
locationInformation: ChaiOne will open its headquartes in mid 2014. Take a look at the building’s renderings and explore some of our awesome ideas. We’re planning on having an awesome rooftop, a indoor pool, a zoo, and free beer 24/7.

name: TEAMROOM
locationInformation: The team room is where we create apps for many of our important clients. Our design and dev team spend their time happily working on each and every project. By 2015 we will have produced 200 iOS and Android apps. Make sure to download them all!
